title: Im done with this game, and any future endevors of riot games.
body:
I just got banned for this.

**In this game, Teemo did nothing to help me solo rift herald, so i get herald and i go back to his lane to push it in to summon herald for him since he was losing, he got mad that i took 5 CS sat and SPAM laughed as his top laner solo'd me when i had 60% hp coming to his lane yet i get banned for this.**
Game 1 
Énergy: Teemo, stealth in bush at my blue plz
Énergy: ivern may try and take
Énergy: i think he stayed bot side.
Énergy: gjk teemo
Énergy: ....
Énergy: what
Énergy: the fuck
Énergy: slowed me to infinity
Énergy: like
Énergy: i literally  couldnt move that entire fight
Énergy: i just wanna know why i couldnt move the entirity of that fight
Énergy: 30 minute perma slow stun
Énergy: kk dumbass **(Here teemo comes and breaks the fruit after i solo'd RH and ate all of them in front of me and spam pinged me while laughing)**
Énergy: enjoy gettin rekt in ur lane
Énergy: ult him fizz
Énergy: nice ult
Énergy: j/k.
Énergy: not my fault he cant even do 1 thing? lol
Énergy: taking RH top
Énergy: Can u stfu bronzie and get back in ur lane **(Teemo calling me a gay boy homo etc etc)**
Énergy: so ic an bring rh
Énergy: thanks, enjoy the report.
Énergy: report this teemo, hes trolling on purpose.
Énergy: ur literally perm banned anyways
Énergy: for that sexual harassment **(He was calling me gay and shit because i took 5 CS to push his lane in to summon rift herald)**
Énergy: so enjoy.
Énergy: yes
Énergy: it does
Énergy: i was trying to RH ur lane
Énergy: and u fuckin troll
Énergy: fuckin teemo throwing
Énergy: typical teemo player
Énergy: yes
Énergy: u are
Énergy: report me then, see who gets banned.
Énergy: troll.
Énergy: i hate people like you.
Énergy: ok
Énergy: im done
Énergy: u and fizz both
Énergy: are the reason this gamers bad
Énergy: Please tell me u guys see this teemo and fizz....
Énergy: please... just tell me u guys see this.
Énergy: u sat and let tahm kill me while spam laughing when i had RH for ur lane. **(This is where he sat and spam laughed while his Tahm that he fed immensely solo'd me when i was bringing herald to his lane)**
Énergy: ur the reason this games bad.
Énergy: you, and solely you.
Énergy: look at them both
Énergy: trying to troll me. **(At this point teemo and fizz are following me around calling me "Gay boy" and stealing my jungle)**
Énergy: by bringing rift herald to ur lane?
Énergy: i cant wait to get the feedback report for you.
Énergy: because RH was running out
Énergy: and i needed to push the wave
Énergy: u fuckin doofus
Énergy: keep saying it
Énergy: ill fap while reading ur feedback report
Énergy: good, did nothing.
Énergy: report away
Énergy: false reports do nothing
Énergy: trolling ur team
Énergy: l;aughing while im trying to RH ur lane
Énergy: this kid...


**I said or did nothing wrong in this game so wtf is this even on here for?**
Game 2
Énergy: yea nid
Énergy: u go farm my lane
Énergy: while i get chased
Énergy: bronzelord.
Énergy: ima just keep dying till i get a jungler.
Énergy: simple as that
Énergy: riot does
Énergy: en joy the report.
Énergy: nid said she wasnt going to gank for me ever, so camp me mid. ez win.
Énergy: hence why this nids in my game.
Énergy: hes part of the wuuuu taaaang
Énergy: clearly 12.
Énergy: no
Énergy: im reporting him for trolling
Énergy: goes jg
Énergy: says he wont gank
Énergy: thats griefing.
Énergy: ur welcome
Énergy: ur more than fine.
Énergy: it helps if u run to tower
Énergy: not into the jg
Énergy: to die
Énergy: lol
Énergy: does it matter, u press 3 buttons and kill everyone.
Énergy: no. his are skill shots.
Énergy: nope, not how it works, creeps can block the Q, merc treads = unstunned b4 W even lands
Énergy: gotta love the fuckin horse
Énergy: just rambo acorss the map
Énergy: and get out with ease
Énergy: id like to stack my Q
Énergy: in my lane

**This is the FIRST ranked game i had on this account and WW went top, stole my blue 3x throughout the game when i was jungle fiddle, then going and PURPOSLY dying to the jungle warwick to transfer my buffs to him... But i still said nothing wrong. again dont know why im BANNED for this.**
Game 3
Énergy: Warwick.
Énergy: Really.
Énergy: i smited.
Énergy: but it didng tgo off lol
Énergy: that feeling when ur smite doesnt go off, when u press it 500x.
Énergy: what
Énergy: the fuck
Énergy: are u doing
Énergy: rofl
Énergy: yea cuz WW was in the bush
Énergy: right b4 i fought it
Énergy: why the fuck
Énergy: would i want u to take my blue on a mana hungry jungler
Énergy: as a top ww
Énergy: even my WW stealin my blue, rofl... 
Énergy: steals my blue, gives it to you.
Énergy: I dont think i can handle this game anymore tonight.
Énergy: wonder if ill get my blue this time around
Énergy: nope
Énergy: ya clearly.
Énergy: perhaps if i got 1 of my 3 blues id be lvl 10 and not 8.
Énergy: yes
Énergy: cuz i wouldnt have died and had more items lol
Énergy: not the gold
Énergy: not rlly, cause my team and their WW keeps stealing my jungle.
Énergy: ya ur right, didnt just doubler bot
Énergy: why am i palyin
Énergy: i should afk in base.
Énergy: stole my blue again
Énergy: so ya.
Énergy: wanna troll ur teammate lose.
Énergy: cuz im fiddle
Énergy: im done guys, my WW trolling me.
Énergy: and they wont surrender.
Énergy: die
Énergy: gj
Énergy: stole my blue and gives it to their WW again
Énergy: fk off.
Énergy: im reporting u and making a ticket about ur ass after this match.


Needless to saay, FUCK you riot, im done with you absolute fucking idiots, it will do me no good to make a ticket about this regardless of how unwarranted the ban is, im simply done with this game and done with anything this absolutely shitty company publishes in the future. Downvote and troll all you want. I wont be back to this bullshit ever again, SMITE here I come.

replies.body: @Everybody please refrain from provoking him and making insensitive or inflammatory remarks. Nobody is beyond reforming and learning from their mistakes, but being dismissive or attacking each other does not help.

This is exactly why shit like this happens, people ban bait by trolling and riot punishes the people who tell them to knock their shit off. and not the actual toxic trolls. thats why this games player base is a gigantic miserable fail.

It seems like the issue here is that you refuse to not respond to negativity, and retaliate by escalating the problem. If you step back, take a deep breath and don't respond to negative remarks, you'd probably be happily playing the game right now. In game you can Mute them and not have to worry about it for the rest of the game. Report them when it's over and they will be the only one having to deal with a ban.
You don't have to respond to a comment like that with bad words and everything if its a good comment. Just let it be.

>who tell them to knock their shit off.

Muting does the same thing and actually succeeds at doing it.
Might be best to lock the thread. It's obvious he doesn't care and just repeats he's not toxic for fun.
So am I the only one who noticed the names don't match?

Buh-Bye.  Not sorry to see you go, not hoping you return.  

- You talk too much in game
- You flame your teammates
- You ask for reports
- You frequently feed based upon your match history. 

I don't know... kinda looks like a win-win scenario.  You get to be rid of a game that clearly isn't working for you and the community and said game is rid of you---a toxic individual that is ruining games for others.

You didnt read the post at all, you're just another random who wants to get on here and feed the flames. Im not the one deserving a ban from any of these games. if your teammates are fucking TROLLING you you need to talk to tell them to stop doing the shit their doing, like top WW stealing ur blue, or top feeding teemo to stop calling you a fa##ot and spam laughing at you when u gank his lane instead of helping. i can 100% promise YOU are part of the problem, not me.

We ARE reading the post and the chat logs! You're just acting like a stubborn child because we do not agree with you. YOU were toxic. The context of what was happening in the game is IRRELEVANT. This is YOUR punishment on YOUR account, and it has absolutely NOTHING to do with what Teemo or any other player did in any of those games.

Get that through your head and you might have a chance of being a decent person someday.
I wasnt toxic, you're part of the problem.
You WERE toxic, and it's apparently a huge problem that you can't even grasp that concept.
No, I was not.

You were toxic and your punishment is justified.
[That last one, though.](http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/ArsonMurderAndJaywalking)
Stupid players deserve to be put in their place. Its not toxic, its called not putting up with fucking nonsense.
Cool story, bro!

I read your post carefully.  

Let me ask you a serious question:  Let's say I follow your premise that "you need to talk to tell them to stop".  Has that ever worked in the history of the internet?  Has a troll ever sat there and said "Oh my God guys, he told me to stop, you know what?  I'm gonna stop because this guy I've been trolling said so".  Now think very carefully about that answer.

You wasted time and effort to talk back to them.  What did it get you?  What did you accomplish?  Clearly it upset you as you are banned and here responding and seeking some type of answer.

No, you don't need to respond to trolling. If your house catches on fire, do you say "well, it's already on fire, may as well burn it down faster"? No, you call the fire department.

If someone is trolling you are more than welcome to mute them, call for a surrender, etc. But you are not welcome to ruin the in game experience for 3 other people on your team (or 8 including the enemy for all chat) by abusing the player in chat.

What likely happened is teems asked you to not do rift that game, you ignored his wishes, and so he got angry at you. You don't get to boss your team around, you are not the team captain, and you are not the one who gets to make the plan. It's a team effort, and you seem to ignore that consistently, thinking that you are alpha and better than everyone else, and you don't let them forget it.
He comes back next week lol. Odviously you still care otherwise you wouldnt of made this post.

Im making this post to bring awareness of the unfair bans issued to people for BEING harrassed and called fa##ots and ni##ers and gay and shit and trolling by their teammates, u tell them to fuck off and SUDDENLY ur the one getting banned. This automated system is fucking garbage. THATS why i made this post.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkLooN,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=j3pc0BZw,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-06-09T01:17:14.770+0000)
>
> Im making this post to bring awareness of the unfair bans issued to people for BEING harrassed and called fa##ots and ni##ers and gay and shit and trolling by their teammates, u tell them to fuck off and SUDDENLY ur the one getting banned. This automated system is fucking garbage. THATS why i made this post.

I dont know how its 2017 but people still havent figured out that no matter how toxic your teammates are you will still get punished if you retaliate.
I didnt retaliate. i told them i was reporting them and moved the fuck on.
And there's your problem.

>u tell them to fuck off and SUDDENLY ur the one getting banned.

Muting does the same thing better. For one, you don't hear what you're saying and for two, you don't get reported for doing so.

Regardless of your teammates' toxicity, being toxic in return is a punishable offense. If the Teemo was using hate speech and was reported, you may be sure he was punished as well. However, threatening reports is a punishable offense in and of itself, even disregarding all of the general negativity and toxicity in your chat.

If someone is being toxic to you, mute them and report them after the game, WITHOUT retaliating. "Fighting back" is pointless and will only be detrimental to you. Riot doesn't tolerate being toxic to a toxic player because you have the ability to remove yourself from that toxicity, simply by muting their chat.

Even if someone trolls you in-game, you just have to learn to deal with it. It happens. More often than anyone here would like. Fortunately, the worst trolls are also toxic in chat, so reporting them for that will get them punished. The problem lies in the fact that intentional feeding is very difficult for a computer program to discern from simply a bad player.

So, depending on how many offenses you've had previously (I'm guessing this is a permanent ban, and you've had chat restrictions and a 14 day ban before), this punishment was warranted, regardless of whether or not your teammates were punished. If you were permanently banned for this without having had chat restrictions and/or a 14-day ban previously, you may be able to open a ticket to discuss lessening the punishment, because there was no hate speech in your chat logs, which is one of the only ways to be permanently banned without warning.

I hope this clarifies any confusion you have about your ban. Anyone else, please correct me if I got any of this wrong.

I wasnt toxic. or fighting back. telling my teammates what they are doing to ruin the game when they are doing it intentionally isnt toxic. how the fuck u supposed to help people get better and stop being fucking shitwits if u dont tell them what they're doing wrong. Nowhere in any of these chats did i "Fight back" or harass anyone.

see what that does.

These parts of the forums are useless, it's not opinions, it's downvotes because they can, i mean you're a piece of shit, sure, but all bans are final, take it from the guy who's been banned more times then his age. lol. Either stop playing find another game, or continue playing, try to be a better person or just don't talk at all, but yeah, they pretty much just spit on you, take your account yadda yadda. xd

No one wants to actually read the logs, and read the commentary of what was happening during the parts in which i tell someone to fuck off. You just want to troll someone whos been punished unfairly and let the actual trolls keep on rolling through the game, I hope some of these players get in your games and do to you what they were doing to me. See how you like it then.

Reading the logs is enough. It tells us you're toxic and refuse to mute and report. Hell, the fact that you can mute and report renders your commentaries irrelevant since you're punished based on your own actions.

Do you understand that cursing at teammates in chat for any reason at all and telling them you are reporting them is both toxic and reportable?

The more you know.

Its been confirmed by several of the forum rioters that a few curse words here and there is not harassing or punishable. my comms in theres games are not flaming at all, HOWEVER... guess what? the ones who issued the reports were the ones flaming. the teemo in game 1? Calling me a gay boy fa##ot all game, didnt help with rieft herald at all, got mad when i didnt give it to him, but i went to his lane to summon it anyways and he sat there spam laughing while his laner solo'd me because he fed the fuck out of him. then proceeded to sexually harass me. none of you even read the post you just make these dumb fuckin comments without knowing the context of anything.
I did read the chat logs in their entirety, which is how I knew that you cursed at your teammates and rubbed it in their faces that you were going to report them.
But when you do this consistently across multiple games, then punishment ensues.
One less toxic player in the game. Only a million more to go.
Yes, because you READ the post, and read the logs, and read what happened in the games, but IM the toxic one. right. You're part of the problem.
Have you gotten a 14 day ban before?
No.
